entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
